Chen:Catnip.NAME: Catnip
Chen:Catnip.FLAVOR: It's irresistible. At least, for the weak willed.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you #yShapeshift each turn, draw #b1 card.

Chen:SacredCatnip.NAME: Sacred Catnip
Chen:SacredCatnip.FLAVOR: Its light pulls in all who witness it. You shall desire it. There are no choices.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you #yShapeshift each turn, gain [E] and draw #b1 card.
